price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߒߠߋ ߟߐ߬ ߟߴߊߟߊ߫ ߕߊ߬ߣߊ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߓߊ߬ߕߏ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߓߊ߬ ߊߟߎ߬ ߡߐ߰ ߞߏߟߐ߲ߓߊߟߌ ߟߎ߬؟
arabic: قُلۡ أَفَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ تَأۡمُرُوٓنِّيٓ أَعۡبُدُ أَيُّهَا ٱلۡجَٰهِلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qul afaghayra al-lahi tamurūnnī aʿbudu ayyuhā al-jāhilūna
